text: My partner took his life three years ago and I haven t stopped thinking about it sinceI ll keep the back story short  My partner of four years who I loved more than anything in the world  who showed me that I was loveable  and gave me hope in so many things  ended his life nearly three years ago  I was   he was   and I came home from university  I d only started   weeks previous  to find that he d completed suicide At the time people kept telling me it would get better  But honestly I don t know that this could ever be better  I ve carried on with my life and still feel utterly lost and empty  and scared that everything could be taken away from me again  with as little warning I m still in uni   pre med  I am in a relationship with a wonderful guy  I do a lot of volunteering  I have a beautiful little cat at home  I have my family and friends to think about  But it still can t take away the pain I still feel every day  It s crushing every morning when I wake up and it s still the last thing I think of each night   I just don t want my life to be like this  Between my past and a   year history of major depression  anorexia nervosa and OCD  it feels like far too much to deal with  Giving up seems so much easier  It s almost a comfort to think of
